forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Then remaining mainly cloudy. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.
